notes: This marks my first day of notetaking on Astraea. Still figuring out how I want this to be structured. Almost two weeks ago my partner of 5+ years and I broke up on the same day that my childhood dog died. So I'm quite sad, and want to log the ways in which I heal my heart.

My digestion is regular, but I'm wondering if the potency of my overnight herbal infusions is affecting the quality of digestion. Or maybe it's the bread I ate before bed. Today my heart feels softer, I think the run really helped release some endorphins, and it always feels good to spit out phlegm that was living in my lungs in the shower after the run.

I had a whole bar of Tony's chocolate last night and smoke much more weed than I wanted to. This morning it's been a struggle not to smoke weed, so I smoked a cigarette instead, which made me feel gross. Recognizing my dependency with weed and trying to cultivate a healthy relationship, as it is a very healing plant in it's own right when used in a balanced way

I really think breathwork and meditation are carrying me through. I went to Sivananda Hatha yoga last night that Don was teaching and seeing friends and practicing lifted my heart. This morning I woke up with (and lately have been feeling) a severely sisyphean sensation. I'm not really sure why I'm here but I keep going, and ultimately I'm grateful for the mystery.

I did an interview for an apprenticeship that did really well. It's helpful to have projects to work on and a path that makes existing on earth feel a little better. Really trying to moderate the weed, but I think that's a lifelong path. Everything in my life feels uprooted so just trying to stay calm at the eye of the storm with a dedication to meditation, yoga, and breathwork.

i saw my psychic yesterday evening for energetic anatomy healing and it was great. she said i had an aura hole above my right shoulder (which has been hurting for months) and it was related to responsibility and burden. wondering if this will ease out post-breakup. it feels way better today than it has been feeling lately, which i will attribute to her magic (placebo? maybe but how did she know my shoulder hurt). slept like a baby after session.

I am trying to figure out a system that keeps my weed consumption boundaried while still enjoying it. I don't think the solution is cutting it out completely. But I did take 2 hits of a joint before sitting down to make this entry and I just can't remember anything I was going to put in, so now it's about the weed. I think I can only take 2 hits once before 4pm. This was my second time taking 2 hits and it's not even 2pm.

digestion_notes: loose stool this morning, overate last night which I'm sure affected digestion
notes: My heart felt soft this morning, lighter. For the first time in a while. Part of me feels compelled to attribute it to the session with my psychic from a couple days ago. Could also be that I'm ovulating. I'm also going to start taking nettle daily in an overnight infusion. This is part of an initiative to build a relationship with a different herb each month and see what my personal interaction with it is like.
